hdr-117806.def: Percentage of the Multidimensional Poverty Index attributed to deprivations in the education dimension.
hdr-117806.name: Contribution of deprivation in education to the Multidimensional Poverty Index
hdr-117806.source: HDRO and OPHI calculations based on data on household deprivations in health, education, and standard of living from various surveys listed in column 1 using the methodology described in Technical note 5 (http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/mpi2021_technical_notes.pdf).
hdr-117806.dataset: HDRO and OPHI calculations based on data on household deprivations in health, education, and standard of living from various surveys listed in column 1 using the methodology described in Technical note 5 (http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/mpi2021_technical_notes.pdf).
